data.message:
Few lines ..
Hey shady you are not a mess
You'r not a flaud human
You're still our super Hero
Yesterday never faded out
You've set them precisely in records
you're human yes you're human but of a different mark
Your legacy will always be remembered till human civilzation continues cause there is no other eminem .

Look down on us we are always looking up on to you ..
don't let us down ..

replies.message: Did you write that Gopal? I teach at the University of Delhi..let me know if you wrote that..message me if you don't want to talk here..lets not talk in here..just message me Bhai..important..
